generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide paved surface with white lane markings, typical of a road used for vehicle and bicycle traffic.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the image, where the person is standing, is elevated and separated from the road by a curb, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible in the background.
- vegetation: Several large trees with green foliage are visible on the left side and in the background.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky.
- person: A man is standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, looking at his phone.
- rider: Two people are visible riding bicycles in the middle distance on the road.
- car: A white car is visible parked on the right side of the image in the background.
- truck: A yellow truck with "WEITE" written on its side is visible on the right side of the image in the background.
- traffic light: Traffic light poles are visible in the image, although the lights themselves are not clearly visible.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign with a white arrow and a yellow rectangular sign with black text.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: Two bicycles are visible, one being ridden by a person in the middle distance and another one parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
